Explain how the introduction of a new technology can create opportunities for both companies and individuals in the fields of media and entertainment.
The invention and widespread adoption of digital technologies, such as high-speed internet connections, smartphones, and streaming platforms, have created numerous opportunities for both companies and individuals in the media and entertainment industries. For instance, independent content creators can now distribute their work directly to audiences through social media channels or online video platforms like YouTube or TikTok. Similarly, businesses can leverage these digital tools to reach larger customer bases, offer personalized services, or even create entirely new business models (e.g., subscription-based streaming services).
